name: Cat Mines
description:
Cat Mines is a minesweeper clone for the Arduboy game console. Select from three difficulties, and see how fast you can flag all the mines! Your time is given once you have won or lost.

You can play it online, or flash the hex data to your Arduboy.

How to play

Move the cursor using the directional pad. A reveals the cell at the cursor location, and B flags it.

Press B to return to the title screen once the game has ended.
